item.description: A Web Dev Odyssey in Nepal: The Comedy of Freelancing Follies ğŸ¤£ Greetings from the heart of the Himalayas, where coding meets chaos, and where momo dumplings take center stage! ğŸ”ï¸â˜• I, your friendly neighborhood cafe cashier, decided to embark on a quest to conquer the fascinating universe of web development.
